System Commands¶

)off Close All¶

Parameter Description
— Close and exit Eli interpreter

)fns List Functions¶

)vars List Variables¶

)lib List Libraries¶

)si Print Error Stack¶

)clear Clear Workspace¶

)wsid Rename workspace¶

)save Save workspace¶

)load Load Workspace¶

)fload Load script¶

)fcopy Copy script¶
